com.scalar.client.storage

Interface AssetProofStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RedisAssetProofStorage

    public interface AssetProofStorage
    A client-side storage of assets. It syncs with the server ledger states, but it manages client-assigned nonce to avoid server-side malicious behavior.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit(java.lang.String assetId, AssetProof data)
      Commits the update for the history of the specified asset.

    • Method Detail

      • suspend

        boolean suspend(java.lang.String assetId,
                java.lang.String nonce)
        Suspends an update for the specified asset. The implementations must be thread-safe, guarantee only one can suspend for each asset ID and persist this action to make it recoverable from failure.
        Parameters:
        assetId - an asset ID
        nonce - client-assigned globally unique ID for each contract execution
        Returns:
        true if a suspension succeeded and false otherwise

      • unsuspend

        void unsuspend(java.lang.String assetId)
        Releases the suspension.
        Parameters:
        assetId - an asset ID

      • getSuspended

        java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getSuspended(java.lang.String assetId)

      • commit

        void commit(java.lang.String assetId,
            AssetProof data)
        Commits the update for the history of the specified asset. The implementations must persist this action to make it recoverable from failure.
        Parameters:
        assetId - an asset ID
        data - a data given from the server for the corresponding contract execution
        Throws:
        ClientException - if the client can't commit or the returned nonce and the client-side nonce don't match

      • getCommitted

        java.util.Optional<AssetProof> getCommitted(java.lang.String assetId)
        Returns the client-side metadata of the specified asset ID.
        Parameters:
        assetId - an asset ID
        Returns:
        an Optional with the AssetProof
